department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: blouse of indigo cotton; a row of beads around neckline and arm openings; lower half of blouse embroidered with beads and red, white and gold colored threads; motifs: squares formed by beads and filled with stitches forming "X" and crosses; three rows of red ribbon  with beads between on bottom quarter; tails of ribbon at center front and back and side seams
title: Blouse
